item.title: Maurice White - I Need You
item.description:
KY: 60658

I can take a woman
or leave her alone
Temporary loves come
and go woh woh woh
You’re the only woman
that I’ve ever known
Who’s got me
losing control
Oh I don’t wanna
dream about you
Or wonder
where you are woo
Oh I wish my heart
could beat without you
But have I gone
too far woo
You say I
need you
You think
that I need
All the love
you’re giving
And I need you
‘cause living alone
Isn’t really
living at all
(Baby baby) never
planned to make love
A permanent
thing
Keeping my
emotions
On the side
woh woh woh
Kind a like
my life
Just the way
that it’s been
Girl I’m taking
my time
Oh I don’t wanna
miss you baby
But that’s the
hardest part woh
Oh I’m trying to
resist you baby
But have I gone
too far
You say I
need you
You think
that I need
All the love
you’re giving
And I need you
‘cause living alone
Isn’t really
living at all
Oh who decides
which one we love
Or when we’re
going to fall
I don’t need
two hands to hold
Two lips
to whisper
I need you
you think that I need
All the love
you’re giving
And I
need you
‘Cause living
alone oh woh
(I need you)
yeah
(You think
that I need)
All the love
you’re giving
And I
(I need you)
Like the air
that I breath
Through on open
window woh
(I need you)
need you
(I can’t
let you leave)
And I won’t
pretend no more
